summary: This bill, the Agricultural and Rural Road Improvement Program Act, aims to amend Title 23 of the United States Code to establish a program focused on improving agricultural and rural roads. It focuses on improving access to farms and agricultural facilities, reducing weight-limited bridges, and improving the safety and efficiency of local roads essential to the agricultural sector. The bill outlines eligible projects, federal cost-sharing, and makes conforming amendments related to apportionment and carbon reduction programs.
